content.title: NIELIT Internship Programme
content.department: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
content.details: The Internship Programme by the National Institute of Electronics & Information Technology (NIELIT) is an opportunity for a student to secure first-hand and practical work experience under the guidance of qualified and experienced Supervisors/Mentors. It also aims at active participation in the learning process through experimentation and putting into practice the knowledge acquired in the classrooms.
benefits: Stipend for S&T section/wing interns: ₹ 5,000/- per month
Stipend for non-S&T section/wing interns: ₹ 3,000/- per month
Certificate issued by NIELIT Haridwar upon completion of the Internship
eligibility: The applicant should be a citizen of India.
The applicant should be studying in a recognized university in India/abroad.
The applicant should have secured at least 60% marks in the last degree or certificate examination.

The applicant should qualify as ANY ONE of the following: Completed or pursuing a Diploma; Completed or pursuing Graduation/Bachelor’s education/Engineering; Completed or pursuing an Integrated or Dual Degree/Master/Post Graduate degree.
content.application_process: Offline. The interested and eligible students must send their applications, along with a brief writeup stating the reason for applying for the internship to the Programme Coordinator at NIELIT Haridwar.
documents_required: Passing Certificate / Degree / Marksheet of Graduation / Post Graduation
A Letter from the Supervisor / Head of the Department / Principal indicating their Status in the Institution
No Objection Certificate (NOC) from the Institution
Identity Card / Proof of Enrolment into the Institute
Details of the Bank Account (for the disbursement of stipend)

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Amount Of Stipend Paid To The Interns?
faqs.answer: For S&T section/wing interns: ₹ 5,000/- per month. For non-S&T section/wing interns: ₹ 3,000/- per month.

faqs.question: To Which Divisions Will The Interns Be Attached?
faqs.answer: Every batch of interns or individual interns, as the case may be, will have a Scientific/Technical Project Supervisor/Mentor to be appointed by the Wing/Section Head of NIELIT Haridwar.

faqs.question: Students From Which Education Streams Can Apply For This Internship?
faqs.answer: Students from all streams may undertake this internship.

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Deliverables On The Part Of The Interns?
faqs.answer: At the end of the Internship Programme, all the interns will be required to submit a report on the work undertaken.

faqs.question: Can School Students Also Apply For This Internship?
faqs.answer: The applicant should be an Indian student from a recognized university in India/abroad who has secured at least 60% marks in the last held degree or certificate examination.

faqs.question: How Many Interns Are Taken In A Month?
faqs.answer: A maximum of five (05) interns shall be engaged for the S&T section at NIELIT Haridwar in a financial year.

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Duration Of The Internship?
faqs.answer: The minimum duration of the internship shall be as defined or prescribed in the curriculum and endorsed by the Sponsoring institution. Duration can be a maximum of 6 months.

faqs.question: Does This Internship Guarantee Placement In NIELIT?
faqs.answer: This internship is neither an employment nor an assurance of employment.

faqs.question: What Is The Attendance Criteria For This Internship Scheme?
faqs.answer: A minimum of 80% attendance is required to be maintained in a month.

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Mode Of Disbursal Of The Amount Of The Stipend?
faqs.answer: The stipend shall be paid in non-cash mode only via Cheque/NEFT/RTGS etc.

faqs.question: When Shall The Certificate Of Completion Be Provided To The Intern?
faqs.answer: Certificates will be issued by NIELIT Haridwar to the interns on completion of the Internship.
